description: I am a Full-Stack web developer from Uruguay, specialized in crafting robust and efficient web applications. My go-to tools include React, with a particular interest in Next.js for the frontend layer, and ChakraUI for aesthetic and functional styling.
also: In the backend, I greatly enjoy designing and modeling relational databases, as well as creating powerful APIs using GraphQL and Prisma. My goal is to create web solutions that are as elegant as they are effective.
